title: Mother Of Son Who Was Held Hostage: 'I Was Very Moved By The President'
teaser: NPR's Audie Cornish talks with Nancy Curtis about the changes to U.S. policy on American hostages. Curtis' son, Theo Padnos, was held hostage in Syria for two years until he was released last August.
